value.title: Self-driving truck startup Kodiak Robotics raises $125M
value.excerpt: Kodiak Robotics, one of the last privately held autonomous truck outfits in Silicon Valley, has raised $125 million in new capital, funding that will be used to double its workforce as it pursues a path to commercialization.

value.title: Tesla starts retrofit program for cameras on older vehicles with ‘Full Self-Driving’
value.excerpt: Tesla has launched a retrofit program for Autopilot cameras on older vehicles with the “Full Self-Driving” package. value.title: It’s ‘Go Time’ For Self-Driving Cars – North Of The Arctic Circle
value.excerpt: Northern Norway will be a closely watched, wintry testing ground for self-driving cars. If they can make it there, autonomous vehicle industry members say, driverless cars can make it anywhere.

value.title: Self-driving cars will eventually be safer than those driven by people, says Chinese search engine giant Baidu
value.excerpt: Autonomous driving will offer a safer and more reliable driving experience than human drivers,’ said Wei Dong, vice-president and COO of Baidu’s intelligent driving division, at a future mobility forum.

value.title: Apple Hires Former Tesla Engineer to Boost Self-Driving Car Effort Bloomberg News
value.excerpt: Apple Inc has hired a former engineer from Tesla Inc in an effort to boost its car-development efforts, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.

value.title: A Former Uber Executive Takes a Fresh Approach to Self-Driving Vehicles
value.excerpt: Waabi founder Raquel Urtasun wants to solve the puzzle of autonomous trucks without driving millions of miles in real-world tests.

value.title: Self driving company Aurora makes Nasdaq debut
value.excerpt: In another highly-anticipated IPO, self-driving technology company Aurora Innovation (AUR) made it’s Nasdaq debut today. The company merged in October with Reinvent Technology Partners Y (RTPY), a special purpose acquisition company (SPAC) led by LinkedIn co-founder Reid Hoffman and Zynga founder Mark Pincus.

value.title: Tesla's handling of braking bug in public self-driving test raises alarms
value.excerpt: Tesla pushed out a new version of the experimental software suite it calls Full Self-Driving to approved drivers on Oct. 23 through an "over the air" update.

value.title: Aptiv Tops Expectations but Chip Shortage Will Continue to Hit Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: The advanced automotive safety systems supplier reports earnings that beat expectations, but lingering supply-chain problems will affect the company for at least a few more quarters.

value.title: TuSimple aims to test self-driving trucks on public roads without human safety operator by EOY

value.title: Waymo will start operating in New York City
value.excerpt: Waymo will start testing its self-driving vans in New York City on November 4th, helping it prepare for heavy traffic and snow..

value.title: Scale AI acquires SiaSearch to give companies the same data engine superpowers that Tesla has
value.excerpt: Scale AI, the five-year-old visual data labeling company, has acquired a small startup that could help expand its reach in Europe and speed up development of its newest product. Financial terms were not disclosed.

value.title: Swedish self-driving start-up Einride expands into U.S. market
value.excerpt: Swedish electric self-driving truck start-up Einride said on Wednesday it has launched operations in the U.S. market and signed up GE Appliances, Swedish vegan milk maker and Oatly and tiremaker Bridgestone as customers.

value.title: Waymo is bringing its autonomous vehicles to New York City for (manually driven) mapping
value.excerpt: The latest autonomous vehicle company to tackle the mean streets of New York City will be Waymo. The Google spinoff is bringing a handful of cars to the Big Apple, where they will start mapping the city streets using manually driven vehicles with two people riding inside.

value.title: Why Tesla's Full Self-Driving software is so controversial
value.excerpt: Tesla's prototype Full Self-Driving software is going out to more and more drivers. But critics say it isn't ready for primetime.

value.title: Driverless delivery company Nuro nabs $600M and partners with Google
value.excerpt: Autonomous vehicle company Nuro has raised $600 million from a slew of high-profile investors, including Tiger Global Management and Google.

value.title: Tesla Forced to Recall 11,704 Vehicles Over Full Self-Driving Glitch
value.excerpt: The software communication issue resulted in some vehicles automatically engaging their brakes, which could lead to rear-end collisions.

value.title: XPeng launches ‘Smart Driving Points’ beta, eerily similar to Tesla’s ‘Safety Score’
value.excerpt: XPeng will implement a 'Smart Driving Points' scoring system very similar to Tesla that ensures drivers don't abuse its self-driving tech.

value.title: Dump Truck Accident Pours Liquid Asphalt From Overpass Onto Vehicles Below, Providing Lessons For AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: The recent news report about a dump truck that inadvertently spewed hot asphalt from an overpass onto a freeway is closely examined, and lessons for AI-based self-driving cars are gleaned from the harrowing event.

value.title: The Factors Driving Demand for Natural Dental Pet Products
value.excerpt: Consumers today are looking for a variety of options to address their pets’ dental health needs, and are increasingly turning to natural and functional solutions.
